definition: The Docs articles are fully written in English. The system allow users to search / browse articles in other languages as well, as long as other users contribute translations.

paragraphs.text: Superalgos and any other integrated project are written in English, since English is considered the default language. Node types, variable names, etc., all is originally in English language.
The Docs content can be translated by anyone willing to contribute some time doing so. That helps users to read the contents of the Docs in their native language.
Users can switch between languages using the links provided at the footer of every page at the Docs.
